BOT_NAME.description: The display name of the bot as it will appear in interactions.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The primary owner's WhatsApp number, including country code (e.g., 2547XXXXXXXX).

MENU_IMAGE.description: Enter the urls of images that you wish to be set as menu image. Separate with a comma if it's more than 1. Reply to an image using .tourl to get one.

OWNER_NAME.description: The name of the primary owner of the bot.

TIMEZONE.description: Timezone for the bot's internal clock (e.g., Africa/Nairobi). Used for time-based functions. Don't change or Google if you don't know!
